abstract: A phrase appearing on some labels was seen as tone-deaf to the dangers of excessive alcohol use and particularly to alcohol’s role in some cases of date rape.
snippet: A phrase appearing on some labels was seen as tone-deaf to the dangers of excessive alcohol use and particularly to alcohol’s role in some cases of date rape.
lead_paragraph: A new label on some bottles of Bud Light, one of the brands owned by the beer giant Anheuser-Busch InBev, is falling flat among women, a demographic group the industry has been desperately courting in hopes of jump-starting flagging sales of suds.

headline.main: Bud Light Withdraws Slogan After It Draws Ire Online
headline.print_headline: Bud Light Label Draws Ire on Social Media
